comments.raw_text: When bookmarks are next to the tabstrip (attachment 1) and the tabstrip grows, causing the bookmarks to shrink (attachment 2), after the tabstrip shrinks, some bookmarks don't come back (attachment 3) although they do after a browser restart.  Weird setup, I know.
comments.creator: mail@lukewagner.name
